kotlin-long: This repository is an adaptation of the exercises provided in https://github.com/nbicocchi/java-core/ for the Kotlin programming language. It contains exercises covering basics, object-oriented design, data structures, generics, functional programming, exceptions, I/O and multi-threading.
ehrforequips-long: EHRforEquips is a multiplatform, portable software designed for freelance doctors working in multiple structures. It follows a plugin architecture, allowing doctors to customize their workflow by adding preferred plugins. The software is compatible with Linux, Windows and MacOS.
pong-long: A terminal-based Pong game using multi-threading and ncurses for rendering.
quizmaker-long: QuizMaker is a tool that converts questions in JSON format to an interactive HTML quiz. It supports single-solution questions and is designed for easy integration and testing.
real-time-coin-acceptor-long: This project implements a real-time coin acceptor using a Raspberry Pi Pico, FreeRTOS, and Micro-ROS. It includes C++ code for the Pico, Python calibration utilities, and a Python frontend. The system is designed for real-time coin detection and value publishing via Micro-ROS topics.
aai_assignment-long: This assignment applies Reinforcement Learning (RL) to optimize a simulated production system. It uses Stable-Baselines3's PPO algorithm to train an agent in a SimPy-based production environment.
kotetris-long: KoTetris is a cross-platform Tetris game built with Kotlin Multiplatform.
